newsitem.title: USA: U.S. to sell $31.25 bln 2-, 5-year notes Aug 27/28.
newsitem.headline: U.S. to sell $31.25 bln 2-, 5-year notes Aug 27/28.

text.p: The Treasury Department said on Wednesday that it will sell $18.75 billion of two-year notes on Aug 27 and $12.5 billion of five-year notes on Aug 28 to refund $27.808 billion of securities maturing Aug 31 and to raise $3.45 billion of new cash.
The notes will be issued Sept 3.
The two-year notes mature on Aug 31, 1998, and the five-year notes mature on Aug 31, 2001.
The CUSIP number for the two-year notes will be 912827Z21 and for the five-year notes will be 912827Z39.
